title: What is this font? ASAP
content:
Can anyone identify these two fonts? Many thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-18%20at%2010_5077.35.16%20PM.png)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-02-18%20at%2010_3874.35.27%20PM.png)
author: oki3169

comments.content:
These two are hand-drawn chalk lettering by Dana Tanamachi so no font at all: [Quiet Print](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/tanamachistudio.com/quiet-print/) and [Dave Barnes Christmas](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/dribbble.com/shots/321210-Dave-Barnes-Christmas)  
For "HANDS": [Warriors](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fwww.merchline.com/hydro74/productdisplay.11909.p.htm), [Leathercrafter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/leathercrafter/), [Los Banditos](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.dafont.com/ifc-los-banditos.font), [Yuma](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/otto-maurer/yuma/), [Miss Scarlett](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/miss-scarlett/), [Lynchburg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/lynchburg/)  
For "A VERRY MERRY": [Letterhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/coffee-bin-fonts/letterhead/), [Ambrosia](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/letterheadfonts/lhf-ambrosia/), [Asteroid Primo](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817082623/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/asteroid-primo/),
Are there any digital fonts that are similar to these?
Did you read my previous post?
